response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe holds immense value for you, just like it does for me. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations, is priced at $900,000. Given its high value and the unique benefits it offers, I am confident it will significantly contribute to your endeavors.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer, and we can discuss further details or address any questions you might have. I am looking forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this exceptional product into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 900000}
